name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closo Bot: Automating Crosslisting, Sharing, and Offering

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plug-in enables seamless crosslisting of products across multiple marketplaces, while also tracking their status, delisting,â€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The plug-in enables seamless crosslisting of products across multiple marketplaces, while also tracking their status, delisting, and relisting as needed. It sends automated offers to customers who have shown interest in a seller's products. This service significantly reduces the time spent on routine tasks, streamlining and automating key processes essential for running a successful reselling business.
